data.name: DOOMED: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Soundtrack, HEYA!!!

Enjoy the awesome songs composed by Andrij Matskevych and Vlad Venom:

01. DOOMED - A look into the future
02. DOOMED - Ambient
03. DOOMED - Escape
04. DOOMED - Fearless
05. DOOMED - Half man, half machine
06. DOOMED - He is not a human
07. DOOMED - I can hear them everywhere
08. DOOMED - I will shoot, you will dance
09. DOOMED - Not an easy way
10. DOOMED - On my way
11. DOOMED - Paranoia
12. DOOMED - Search of Answers
13. DOOMED - Tension
14. DOOMED - They are nearby
15. DOOMED -They awakened the beast
16. DOOMED - This Walls Have Eyes
17. DOOMED - Time is running out
18. DOOMED - Unstoppable
19. DOOMED - Way Home
20. DOOMED - You seem ready
21. DOOMED - Boss fight theme
22. DOOMED - Deep Fears
23. DOOMED - Hound Dogs
24. DOOMED - Kill 'em All
25. DOOMED - Shimmering Corridor
26. DOOMED - Unlimited kill theme
27. DOOMED - Wait, i think i know you

files will be placed in you DOOMED folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\DOOMED\DOOMED OST

WARNING:
The Official Trailer soundtrack is not included at the list, you can find it at https://itunes.apple.com/ru/album/%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5-%D0%B2%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B5-ia-shb-nygrth/1382413885?i=1382413893

Song - Преломление второе (I'a Sh'b) [N'ygr'th]

DOOMED ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK © Copyright 2018 Andrij Matskevych & Vlad Venom. All Rights Reserved.
